item.title: 深圳联通可预约上门办理 eSIM 服务
item.guid: 深圳联通可预约上门办理-eSIM-服务
item.description:
Yesterday, Shenzhen China Unicom announced the launch of its "eSIM Door-to-Door Service," allowing users to book appointments through official channels and receive on-site support within 24 hours. This service covers the entire city of Shenzhen, and China Unicom business halls are also simultaneously offering eSIM services. 昨天，深圳联通宣布推出「eSIM 上门办理」服务，用户可通过官方渠道预约，享受最快 24 小时内的上门支持。此次服务覆盖深圳全市，联通营业厅亦同步开放 eSIM 业务办理。

It is reported that Shenzhen China Unicom's eSIM service upgrade not only supports the new iPhone series but also comes with seven exclusive benefits, including device data migration guidance, mobile phone usage coaching, rapid home network fault repair, and free whole-home broadband inspection (regardless of operator), further enhancing user experience. 据悉，深圳联通此次 eSIM 服务升级不仅支持 iPhone 新品系列，还附带七项专属福利，包括设备数据迁移指导、手机使用辅导、家庭网络故障极速修复、全屋宽带免费检测（不限运营商）等，进一步提升用户体验。

According to the official introduction, users can make appointments by scanning a QR code, and eSIM services can be processed at business halls in all districts of Shenzhen. 官方介绍，用户可通过扫码预约办理，深圳各区营业厅均可办理 eSIM 业务。

In addition, China Unicom has simultaneously opened pre-orders for the new iPhone series, with official sales starting tomorrow. Users who apply for eSIM will also receive guidance on using the new device, further lowering the barrier to switching phones. 此外，中国联通同步开启 iPhone 新品预购，明天正式开售。用户在办理 eSIM 的同时，可获得新品使用辅导，进一步降低换机门槛。

item.title: iPhone 17 系列首销 10 天销量超前代 14%，中国市场标准版翻倍增长
item.guid: iPhone-17-系列首销-10-天销量超前代-14%，中国市场标准版翻倍增长
item.description:
According to the latest data from market research firm Counterpoint, Apple's iPhone 17 series performed better in sales during the first 10 days after launch than its predecessor, with overall sales in the US and Chinese markets increasing by 14% compared to the iPhone 16 series during the same period. 根据市场研究机构 Counterpoint 最新数据，苹果 iPhone 17 系列在上市前 10 天的销量表现优于前代机型，在美国和中国市场整体销量比 iPhone 16 系列同期增长 14%。

Among them, demand for the standard iPhone 17 was particularly strong, with sales in the Chinese market almost double that of the iPhone 16. 其中，标准版 iPhone 17 的需求尤为强劲，在中国市场的销量几乎是 iPhone 16 的两倍。

Analysts pointed out that the strong sales of iPhone 17 are mainly due to screen upgrades, larger storage space, and the new A19 chip. 分析师指出，iPhone 17 的热销主要得益于屏幕升级、更大存储空间以及搭载全新 A19 芯片。

Counterpoint Senior Analyst Ivan Lam said: "Consumers have reacted positively to the improved specifications and upgrades of the iPhone 17 base model, especially in the Chinese market, where sales momentum remained strong in October." Counterpoint 高级分析师 Ivan Lam 表示：「消费者对 iPhone 17 基础款的改进规格和升级反应积极，尤其是在中国市场，销售势头在 10 月仍保持良好。」

Meanwhile, the high-end iPhone 17 Pro Max model is also highly sought after in the US market. This model features the strongest camera system to date, an improved thermal design, and the most significant aesthetic adjustments in recent years, attracting many users who purchased phones during the pandemic to upgrade. 与此同时，高端机型 iPhone 17 Pro Max 在美国市场同样受到追捧。该机型配备了迄今为止最强的摄像系统、改进的散热设计，以及近年来最显著的外观调整，吸引了不少在疫情期间购买手机的用户进行换机升级。

item.title: 微软承认 Windows 11 更新引发恢复环境键鼠失灵
item.guid: 微软承认-Windows-11-更新引发恢复环境键鼠失灵
item.description:
According to Tom's Hardware, a serious issue has re-emerged with the Windows 11 October update, where some users found USB keyboards and mice completely unusable when entering the Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE), preventing any interactive operations. 据 Tom’s Hardware 报道，Windows 11 十月更新再现严重问题，部分用户在进入 Windows 恢复环境（Windows RE）时发现 USB 键盘和鼠标完全无法使用，导致无法进行任何交互操作。

It is understood that this issue stems from update patch KB5066835, affecting Windows 11 25H2, 24H2, and Windows Server. Microsoft has confirmed the existence of the problem and stated that it is developing a fix, with an update expected to be rolled out in the coming days. 据悉，本次问题源自更新补丁 KB5066835，影响范围包括 Windows 11 25H2、24H2 以及 Windows Server。微软已确认该问题的存在，并表示正在开发修复方案，预计将在未来几天内推送更新。

It is worth noting that only USB peripherals are affected; older PS/2 interface keyboards and mice can still be used normally. As Windows RE is the default diagnostic and repair tool when the system cannot start properly, this issue could cause significant trouble for ordinary users and IT administrators. 值得注意的是，受影响的仅为 USB 外设，老式 PS/2 接口键盘和鼠标仍可正常使用。由于 Windows RE 是系统无法正常启动时的默认诊断与修复工具，该问题可能给普通用户和 IT 管理人员带来较大困扰。

Microsoft also reminds users that USB peripherals are not affected when the system is running normally; the malfunction only occurs when entering the recovery environment. The official statement promises to release a patch to fix this issue as soon as possible and provide more information in subsequent announcements. 微软同时提醒用户，系统在正常运行状态下 USB 外设不受影响，仅在进入恢复环境时会出现失灵现象。官方承诺将尽快发布补丁修复该问题，并在后续公告中提供更多信息。

item.title: 12306 升级积分「零元购」车票兑换功能
item.guid: 12306-升级积分「零元购」车票兑换功能
item.description:
Yesterday, China Railway 12306 announced the official launch of an upgraded points-based "zero-cost" ticket redemption feature. 昨天，中国铁路 12306 宣布正式上线升级版积分「零元购」车票兑换功能。

According to the latest rules, frequent traveler members can use points to directly deduct ticket fares, enabling "0-yuan purchase" tickets. 根据最新规则，常旅客会员可使用积分直接抵扣票款，实现「0 元购」车票。

According to the railway department, ordinary members can earn 5 times the ticket face value in points after purchasing a ticket, senior members aged 60 and above can earn 15 times the points, and youth members aged 14 to 28 can earn 10 times the points. 据铁路部门介绍，普通会员购票后可获票面金额 5 倍积分，60 周岁及以上老年会员可获 15 倍积分，而 14 至 28 周岁的青年会员则可获 10 倍积分。

For example, an ordinary member spending 1000 yuan on tickets can earn 5000 points (redeemable for 50 yuan), while a youth member spending the same amount can earn 10000 points (redeemable for 100 yuan). 例如，普通会员花费 1000 元购票可获 5000 积分（可抵 50 元），青年会员同样消费可获 10000 积分（可抵 100 元）。

Points can not only be used to redeem tickets but also for a newly added seat upgrade function. Passengers can upgrade their seats on the train by scanning the QR code on the armrest or by contacting staff. 积分不仅可用于兑换车票，还新增了座位升席功能。乘客可在列车上通过扫描座椅扶手二维码或联系工作人员，使用积分办理升席。

It should be noted that new tickets after upgrading cannot be refunded or changed. If they cannot be used due to force majeure or railway responsibility, points for the unused segment will be returned to the account. 需要注意的是，升席后的新车票不可退改，若因不可抗力或铁路责任导致无法使用，未乘区间的积分将退回账户。

The railway reminds that points are valid for 12 months from the date of entry into the account and will automatically expire if unused after this period. Passengers aged 12 and above can apply to become members through the 12306 website, App, or station windows, and will be eligible for redemption once their accumulated points reach 10000 for the first time. 铁路方面提醒，积分自入账起 12 个月内有效，逾期未使用将自动作废。年满 12 周岁的乘客即可通过 12306 网站、App 或车站窗口申请成为会员，首次累计积分达 10000 分后即可具备兑换资格。

item.title: 「京东汽车」车身细节曝光，将搭载新国标半隐藏门把手
item.guid: 「京东汽车」车身细节曝光，将搭载新国标半隐藏门把手
item.description:
According to Yicai, "JD Auto" body data was exposed today. According to updated information on the official reservation page, the new car adopts a high-strength cage design, with high-strength steel accounting for over 70%, and is equipped with a front three-dimensional protection frame, increasing overall impact resistance by 18%. 据第一财经报道，「京东汽车」车身数据今日曝光。根据官方预约页面更新的信息，新车采用高强度笼式设计，高强度钢占比超过 70%，并配备正面立体防护框架，使整体抗冲击性提升 18%。

The side features integrated hot-formed double door rings, a technology derived from the Tesla Cybertruck, combined with new national standard mechanical semi-hidden safety door handles. 侧面则搭载一体式热成型双门环，技术源自特斯拉 Cybertruck，并结合新国标机械式半隐藏安全门把手。

In terms of performance, the vehicle's curb weight is increased by 300 kg compared to models in the same class, the wheel track is 45 mm wider than the industry average, and the tire width is 10 mm greater. In the moose test, it achieved a speed exceeding 75 km/h, outperforming mainstream models in its class. 性能层面，车辆整备质量较同级车型增加 300 kg，轮距比行业平均宽 45 mm，胎宽多出 10 mm。在麋鹿测试中，成绩超过 75 km/h，表现优于同级主流车型。

item.title: 蔚来李斌：第四季度必须实现盈利
item.guid: 蔚来李斌：第四季度必须实现盈利
item.description:
According to "Yijian Auto," on the afternoon of October 17, Nio held a quarterly internal meeting. Founder, Chairman, and CEO William Li (Li Bin) reiterated at the meeting that the company must achieve quarterly profitability by the fourth quarter of 2025. 据「一见 Auto」报道，10 月 17 日下午，蔚来召开季度内部会议，创始人、董事长兼 CEO 李斌在会上再次强调，2025 年第四季度必须实现单季度盈利。

Li Bin pointed out that the profitability target is not just a phased task, but also the cornerstone of the company's long-term sustainable development. He listed this goal as the top priority for his personal Q4 VAU (Vision Action Upgrade) and clearly proposed three key actions: 李斌指出，盈利目标不仅是阶段性任务，更是公司长期可持续发展的基石。他将该目标列为个人四季度 VAU（Vision Action Upgrade）的首要事项，并明确提出三项关键行动：

    Focus on marketing key models to ensure sales growth;

    Strengthen supply chain assurance and cost reduction measures;

    Deliver high-quality software versions on time, enhancing user experience.

Li Bin stated: "The fourth quarter is about diligently selling cars, diligently implementing cost-reduction measures, and diligently improving user experience." He also emphasized that the fundamental key to profitability is "selling more cars," rather than simply relying on cutting expenses. 李斌表示：「四季度就是踏踏实实卖车，踏踏实实把降本措施落实到位，踏踏实实把用户体验搞好。」他同时强调，盈利的根本在于「多卖车」，而非单纯依靠削减费用。

With the market performance of the Ledao L90 and the new ES8 exceeding expectations, NIO's internal confidence has rebounded. Li Bin believes that it is currently a "moment of reckoning," and all employees must seize the remaining seventy-plus days to ensure targets are met and lay the foundation for the next three years' operational plans and system capability building. 随着乐道 L90 与全新 ES8 的市场表现超出预期，蔚来内部信心有所回升。李斌认为，当前正处于「交卷时刻」，全员必须抓住剩余七十余天，确保目标兑现，并为未来三年的经营计划和体系能力建设打下基础。

item.title: 阿里夸克「C 计划」或推新对话形态，目标直指豆包
item.guid: 阿里夸克「C-计划」或推新对话形态，目标直指豆包
item.description:
According to Sina Tech, Alibaba's Quark is secretly advancing an AI business codenamed "Project C" internally. The project is led by Quark's core team, with several senior members from Tongyi Lab also participating. 据新浪科技报道，阿里夸克正在内部秘密推进一项代号为「C 计划」的 AI 业务。该项目由夸克核心团队主导，通义实验室多位高级成员也参与其中。

Sources revealed that "Project C" is related to the deployment of conversational AI applications, and its first phase of results may be launched soon. In fact, the plan has been underway within Quark for some time, with relevant personnel calling it a "product that requires long-term investment and relies on breakthroughs in model technology." 消息人士透露，「C 计划」与对话式 AI 应用布局相关，首个阶段性成果或将在近日落地。事实上，该计划已在夸克内部推进多时，相关人士称这是一个「需要长期投入，且依赖模型技术突破的产品」。

Regarding the origin of the codename "C," there are currently two speculations: one is that "C" stands for "Chat," suggesting Quark might launch a new conversational form; another, more provocative theory, is that "C" is taken from the classic game "Pac-Man," implying a direct challenge to ByteDance's "Doubao." 关于代号「C」的由来，目前有两种猜测：一是「C」代表「Chat」，暗示夸克可能推出全新对话形态；另一种更具火药味的说法是，「C」取自经典游戏「吃豆人（Pac-Man）」，寓意直指字节系的「豆包」。

As of now, Quark has not responded to the related news. 截至目前，夸克方面尚未对相关消息作出回应。

item.title: X 推出闲置用户名市场：稀有用户名最高或将要价数百万美元
item.guid: X-推出闲置用户名市场：稀有用户名最高或将要价数百万美元
item.description:
According to The Verge, social media platform X recently announced the launch of an "idle username marketplace," allowing some paid users to apply for account names that were previously unavailable. 据 The Verge 报道，社交平台 X 近日宣布将推出「闲置用户名市场」，允许部分付费用户申请此前无法使用的账号名称。

It is reported that "Premium Plus" and "Premium Business" subscribers will be the first to gain access. They can search for and apply for idle accounts in the platform's "username marketplace." The official categorizes usernames into two types: 据悉，「Premium Plus」和「Premium Business」订阅用户将率先获得访问权限。他们可以在平台的「用户名市场」中搜索并申请闲置账号。官方将用户名分为两类：

    Priority usernames: offered for free, usually including full names, multi-word phrases, or alphanumeric combinations;

    Rare usernames: available for a fee, with prices ranging from $2,500 to millions of dollars, depending on scarcity and market demand.

The platform emphasized that this is not a one-time benefit but a long-term service aimed at attracting more users to upgrade their subscriptions. If a user successfully obtains a new username, their original username will be frozen. In the future, the official may offer paid redirection features. 平台方面强调，这并非一次性福利，而是长期服务，旨在吸引更多用户升级订阅。如果用户成功获取新用户名，原有用户名将被冻结。未来，官方可能提供付费的重定向功能。

It is worth noting that once a user downgrades their subscription, their account will automatically revert to the original username, and any rare usernames acquired in the marketplace will become invalid. 值得注意的是，一旦用户降级订阅，其账号将自动恢复为原始用户名，市场中获得的稀有用户名也将失效。

item.title: 亚马逊云服务大规模宕机，波及互联网与航空业
item.guid: 亚马逊云服务大规模宕机，波及互联网与航空业
item.description:
According to reports from The Verge and CNBC, Amazon Web Services (AWS) experienced a widespread outage in the early hours of October 20th, Eastern Time, causing multiple online services, including Amazon, Alexa, Snapchat, and Fortnite, to become unavailable. 据 The Verge 和 CNBC 相关报道，亚马逊网络服务（AWS）于美东时间 10 月 20 日凌晨发生大范围故障，导致包括 Amazon、Alexa、Snapchat、Fortnite 在内的多项在线服务无法正常使用。

According to the AWS status page, the US-EAST-1 region first reported anomalies at 3:11 AM, with officials stating they were "investigating increased error rates and latency issues across multiple services" and promising an update within 45 minutes. 根据 AWS 状态页面显示，美国东部一区（US-EAST-1）在凌晨 3:11 首次报告异常，官方称「正在调查多个服务错误率增加和延迟问题」，并承诺将在 45 分钟内更新进展。

The impact was not limited to internet applications; the aviation industry was also affected. Websites and applications of airlines such as Delta and United were temporarily unable to operate normally, preventing some users from completing online check-ins, viewing bookings, or assigning seats. 受影响的不仅是互联网应用，航空业也受到波及。Delta 与 United 等航空公司的网站和应用一度无法正常运行，部分用户无法完成在线值机、查看预订或座位分配。

United stated that some internal systems were affected and backup solutions had been activated to restore services; Delta reported "minor delays" but anticipated no long-term significant impact. United 表示部分内部系统受影响，已启用备用方案恢复服务；Delta 则称出现了「轻微延误」，但预计不会造成长期重大影响。

AWS stated around 5:30 AM Eastern Time that it was "seeing significant signs of recovery" and was gradually clearing backlogged requests. However, the official has not yet confirmed the specific cause of the outage nor provided a full recovery timeline. AWS 在美东时间 5:30 左右表示「看到显著恢复迹象」，并逐步清理积压请求。不过，目前官方尚未确认具体故障原因，也未给出完整恢复时间表。

It is worth noting that AWS has experienced similar large-scale outages in the same region in 2020, 2021, and 2023, highlighting the concentrated risks of cloud computing infrastructure. 值得注意的是，AWS 在 2020 年、2021 年和 2023 年均曾在同一区域发生过类似大规模中断，凸显出云计算基础设施的集中性风险。

item.title: 缅甸边境电诈园区发现 30 套「星链」通信设备
item.guid: 缅甸边境电诈园区发现-30-套「星链」通信设备
item.description:
According to Myanmar state media The Global New Light of Myanmar, the Myanmar military recently seized 30 sets of "Starlink" receivers and accessories in the KK Park in Karen State during a clearance operation in the border area. 据缅甸官媒《缅甸环球新光报》报道，缅甸国防军近日在边境地区开展清剿行动时，于克伦邦 KK 园区查获 30 套「星链」接收器及配件。

Since early September, the Myanmar military has been continuously advancing a special operation to combat online fraud and gambling along the Myanmar-Thailand border. In this operation, the military searched over 100 buildings, found 2198 individuals involved in fraud and gambling, and confiscated a large amount of communication equipment, including "Starlink" devices. 自 9 月初以来，缅甸国防军在缅泰边境持续推进打击电诈与赌博的专项行动。本次行动中，军方共搜查 100 余栋建筑，发现 2198 名涉诈涉赌人员，并缴获包括「星链」设备在内的大量通信器材。

Due to its low-latency and wide-coverage characteristics, "Starlink" has been used in some grey industries in recent years to circumvent regulation. 「星链」因具备低延迟、广覆盖的特性，近年来在部分灰色产业链中被用于规避监管。

The report also stated that the Myanmar military said it would continue to maintain a high-pressure stance in the border areas in the future, striving to completely eliminate related illegal networks. 报道还称，缅甸国防军方面表示，后续将在边境地区继续保持高压态势，力求彻底清除相关非法网络。

item.title: 💡 前 OpenAI 研究员：AI Agent 的真正落地仍需十年
item.guid: 💡-前-OpenAI-研究员：AI-Agent-的真正落地仍需十年
item.description:
According to The Decoder, former OpenAI and Tesla AI researcher Andrej Karpathy stated in a recent interview that the current hype surrounding "Agent AI" is overly exaggerated, with a significant gap between reality and expectations. 据 The Decoder 报道，前 OpenAI 与 Tesla 的人工智能研究员 Andrej Karpathy 在近期的一次采访中表示，当前围绕「Agent AI」的热潮过于夸大，现实与预期之间存在明显落差。

He bluntly stated that "these models simply cannot work like human interns or professional employees," and predicted that truly reliable Agent AI might still take about 10 years to achieve. 他直言「这些模型根本无法像人类实习生或专业员工那样工作」，并预测真正可靠的 Agent AI 可能还需要约 10 年时间才能实现。

Karpathy pointed out that current large models have serious deficiencies in core cognition, multimodal processing, long-term memory, and complex task execution. Karpathy 指出，目前的大模型在核心认知、多模态处理、长期记忆以及复杂任务执行方面均存在严重不足。

He believes that even advanced models like GPT-5 Pro can only function in narrow scenarios such as "code analysis auxiliary tools," and their true value remains at the "auto-completion" level. 他认为，即便是 GPT-5 Pro 这样的先进模型，也只能在「代码分析的辅助工具」等狭窄场景中发挥作用，其真正价值仍停留在「自动补全」层面。

At the data level, Karpathy criticized the poor quality of existing training corpora, stating that a large amount of internet content is "fragments, symbols, and noise," leading models to rely more on memorization than understanding. 在数据层面，Karpathy 批评现有训练语料质量低劣，大量互联网内容是「碎片、符号与噪音」，导致模型更多依赖记忆而非理解。

He emphasized that future breakthroughs should come from "high-quality, filtered data" and called on the industry to value professional content creators. 他强调未来的突破应来自「高质量、经过筛选的数据」，并呼吁行业重视专业内容创作者的价值。

Regarding the future development path, Karpathy does not believe there will be a single technological singularity, but rather a gradual progression relying on "better data, stronger architectures, more efficient learning methods, and faster hardware." 对于未来发展路径，Karpathy 并不认为会出现单一的技术奇点，而是依赖「更优的数据、更强的架构、更高效的学习方法与更快的硬件」逐步推进。

He also emphasized that, in the long run, language models need to learn through interaction with the environment, not just by imitating text. 他同时强调，长远来看，语言模型需要通过与环境交互来学习，而不仅仅是模仿文本。

item.title: 雷鸟 Air4 智能眼镜本月发布，王自如助阵
item.guid: 雷鸟-Air4-智能眼镜本月发布，王自如助阵
item.description:
RayNeo Innovation announced yesterday on social media that it will hold a new product launch event on October 23rd at 19:30, officially introducing its new head-mounted display product, "RayNeo Air4". 雷鸟创新昨天在社交平台宣布，将于 10 月 23 日 19:30 举办新品发布会，正式推出头戴电视新品「RayNeo Air4」。

The product is dubbed "the world's first HDR-supported viewing glasses" and has invited Wang Ziruo, known as "China's digital review pioneer," to conduct the first review. 该产品被称为「全球首款支持 HDR 的观影眼镜」，并邀请「中国数码测评鼻祖」王自如进行首测。

Meanwhile, Wang Ziruo's identity has also attracted external attention. According to RayNeo, he has officially joined RayNeo Innovation and had in-depth discussions with founder Li Hongwei. 与此同时，王自如的身份也引发外界关注。据雷鸟方面披露，他已正式入职雷鸟创新，并与创始人李宏伟进行了深度交流。

Currently, RayNeo has not announced his specific position, but the official announcement has foreshadowed a "Wang Ziruo × Li Hongwei" dialogue event on October 22nd at 18:00, which may reveal more clues about his "new identity." 目前，雷鸟尚未公布其具体职位，但官方已预告将在 10 月 22 日 18:00 举办「王自如 × 李宏伟」对谈活动，届时或将揭晓更多关于其「新身份」的线索。

RayNeo Air4 is equipped with the world's first custom Vision 4000 image quality chip specifically designed for glasses, supporting HDR10 mode, capable of displaying 1.07 billion colors, bringing more delicate light and shadow layers and realistic visual effects. 雷鸟 Air4 搭载全球首颗专为眼镜打造的定制 Vision 4000 画质芯片，支持 HDR10 模式，可呈现 10.7 亿色彩，带来更细腻的明暗层次与真实的视觉效果。

In terms of audio quality, RayNeo collaborated with acoustic brand B&O for tuning, featuring a built-in four-speaker system. The official claim is that users can achieve a cinema-level "dual audio-visual immersion" experience without needing to wear additional headphones. 在音质方面，雷鸟与声学品牌 B&O 合作调校，内置四扬声器系统，官方宣称用户无需额外佩戴耳机，即可获得影院级的「视听双沉浸」体验。

Officials stated that in addition to RayNeo Air4, this launch event will also introduce multiple product updates, further expanding the head-mounted display ecosystem. 官方表示，本次发布会除 RayNeo Air4 外，还将带来多项产品动态，进一步扩展头戴显示生态。

item.title: Redmi K90 Pro Max 代言人或为陈奕迅

item.description:

The poster features red stage lighting as a background, with the caption "New friend, see you tomorrow," and emphasizes that the new product will bring a "low power consumption, high performance" experience. Redmi 昨天在社交平台发布预热海报，宣布全新旗舰机型 K90 Pro Max 即将登场。海报以红色舞台灯光为背景，配文「新朋友 明天见」，并强调新品将带来「低功耗、高性能」的体验。

item.title: 宇树科技发布「能跳芭蕾舞」的机器人 H2
item.guid: 宇树科技发布「能跳芭蕾舞」的机器人-H2
item.description:
Yesterday, Unitree Robotics officially released its full-size humanoid robot H2. This robot stands 180 cm tall, possesses 31 degrees of freedom, and can perform difficult movements such as ballet and martial arts, demonstrating agile and elegant athletic capabilities. 昨天，宇树科技正式发布全尺寸人形机器人 H2。该机身高 180 cm，具备 31 个自由度，能够完成芭蕾舞、武术等高难度动作，展现出敏捷与优雅的运动能力。

According to reports, H2's degree of freedom configuration has increased by 63% compared to H1, especially with more joints added to the arms and waist, making its upper limb movements closer to those of humans. 据介绍，H2 在自由度配置上较 H1 提升 63%，尤其在手臂与腰部部分增加了更多关节，使其上肢动作更接近人类。

Currently, H2 is in the same technical tier as products like Tesla's 'Optimus' and Zhimeng's 'Lingxi X2'. 目前，H2 与特斯拉「擎天柱」、智元「灵犀 X2」等产品处于同一技术梯队。

Unitree stated that the launch of H2 is a crucial step in the company's 'full-size, full-scenario, full-price range' strategy, and in the future, it will further expand into industrial, scientific research, and consumer markets through product matrix segmentation. 宇树方面表示，H2 的推出是公司「全尺寸、全场景、全价位」战略的重要一步，未来将通过产品矩阵的细分，进一步拓展工业、科研及消费级市场。

item.title: 触觉感知接近人类水平，Sharpa Robotics 推出全新仿生机械手
item.guid: 触觉感知接近人类水平，Sharpa-Robotics-推出全新仿生机械手
item.description:
Recently, Sharpa Robotics announced that its highly anticipated bionic robotic hand, 'SharpaWave,' has officially entered mass production and begun shipping to customers. 日前，Sharpa Robotics 宣布其备受关注的仿生机械手「SharpaWave」已正式进入量产阶段，并开始向客户发货。

Since its debut at the ICRA 2025 exhibition, this product has sparked widespread discussion in the robotics field due to its advanced haptic perception capabilities. 这款产品自 ICRA 2025 展会亮相以来，因其先进的触觉感知能力而在机器人领域引发广泛讨论。

According to reports, SharpaWave is equipped with Sharpa Robotics' independently developed 'Dynamic Tactile Array' (DTA). 据介绍，SharpaWave 搭载 Sharpa Robotics 自主研发的「动态触觉阵列」（Dynamic Tactile Array，简称 DTA）。

This system, based on neural network algorithms, boasts a pressure sensitivity of 0.005 N, covers a range of 0–30 N, has a data frame rate of up to 180 FPS, and a spatial resolution of less than 1 mm. It can achieve real-time texture recognition and six-dimensional force detection, aiming to bring robot manipulation closer to the perceptual level of human hands. 该系统基于神经网络算法，具备 0.005 N 的压力灵敏度，覆盖 0–30 N 范围，数据帧率高达 180 FPS，空间分辨率小于 1 mm，可实现实时纹理识别和六维力检测，目标是让机器人操作更接近人类手部的感知水平。

In terms of mechanical structure, SharpaWave adopts a 22-degree-of-freedom design based on the 'isomorphic architecture' concept, with an overall weight of 1200 g and dimensions of 200 mm × 90 mm × 50 mm. The official statement claims its fingertips can output over 20 N of force, and its gesture action frequency exceeds 4 Hz, balancing both speed and strength. 在机械结构方面，SharpaWave 采用 22 自由度设计，基于「同构架构」理念，整体重量为 1200 g，尺寸为 200 mm × 90 mm × 50 mm。官方称其指尖可输出超过 20 N 的力量，手势动作频率超过 4 Hz，兼顾速度与力量。

Compared to other products on the market, SharpaWave is positioned more towards high-performance haptic feedback. For instance, the recently unveiled 'Wuji Hand' emphasizes lightweight design, weighing only 600 g, with 20 degrees of freedom and 15 N fingertip force, focusing on a balance between performance and cost. SharpaWave, on the other hand, focuses on perception accuracy and manipulation capabilities, targeting high-end research and development applications. 与市场上其他产品相比，SharpaWave 的定位更偏向高性能触觉反馈。例如，近期亮相的「Wuji Hand」强调轻量化，仅重 600 g，具备 20 自由度和 15 N 指尖力量，主打性能与成本的平衡。而 SharpaWave 则选择在感知精度和操控能力上发力，面向高端研究与开发应用。

Furthermore, Sharpa also provides a complete development ecosystem, including a cross-platform development kit, a dedicated control application 'SharpaPilot,' and high-fidelity simulation models adapted for MuJoCo and ROS. The device uses a standard Ethernet interface for easy integration. 此外，Sharpa 还提供了完整的开发生态，包括跨平台开发套件、专用控制应用「SharpaPilot」以及适配 MuJoCo 和 ROS 的高保真仿真模型。设备采用标准以太网接口，方便集成。

item.title: 13980 元起，帝瓦雷 Phantom Ultimate 正式发布
item.guid: 13980-元起，帝瓦雷-Phantom-Ultimate-正式发布
item.description:
Recently, French acoustic engineering company Devialet officially launched its new generation of high-fidelity speakers, 'Devialet Phantom Ultimate,' at the MOIN Recording Studio on the Bund in Shanghai. 日前，法国声学工程公司 Devialet 在上海外滩的墨音 MOIN 录音室正式发布了新一代高保真音箱「Devialet Phantom Ultimate」。

As the successor to the first Phantom model from 2015, this new product features comprehensive upgrades in design, sound quality, and smart experience, aiming to deliver a more immersive and impactful sound experience to users. 作为 2015 年首款 Phantom 的继任者，这款新品在设计、音质和智能体验上全面升级，旨在为用户带来更沉浸、更具冲击力的声音体验。

According to the official introduction, the Devialet Phantom Ultimate has undergone years of research and development, embodying the acoustic and design prowess of the Paris team. It incorporates multiple proprietary technologies, with the high-end 108 dB model covering a frequency response range of 14Hz-35kHz, a total power of 1100 watts, and support for Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3. 官方介绍，Devialet Phantom Ultimate 历经多年研发，凝聚了巴黎团队的声学与设计实力，搭载多项专有技术，高配版 108 dB 机型频响范围覆盖 14Hz-35kHz，总功率达 1100 瓦，并支持 Wi-Fi 6 与蓝牙 5.3。

In terms of appearance, the Devialet Phantom Ultimate continues its iconic silhouette and introduces three color options: 'Deep Forest Green,' 'Pearl White,' and the 'Opéra de Paris Special Edition.' The special edition is hand-covered with 22K gold leaf by the French Gohard workshop, showcasing a fusion of craftsmanship and art. 外观方面，Devialet Phantom Ultimate 延续标志性轮廓，并推出「深林绿」「珍珠白」以及「巴黎歌剧院特别版」三种配色。特别版由法国戈哈德工坊手工贴覆 22K 金箔，彰显工艺与艺术的结合。

For user experience, the product runs the latest DOS3 system, supports mainstream protocols such as AirPlay, Google Cast, Roon Ready, Spotify Connect, and Tidal Connect, and offers three modes—Music, Podcast, and Cinema—along with six-band equalizer adjustment via the new Devialet APP. 在用户体验上，产品运行最新 DOS3 系统，支持 AirPlay、Google Cast、Roon Ready、Spotify Connect、Tidal Connect 等主流协议，并通过全新 Devialet APP 提供音乐、播客、影院三种模式及六段均衡器调节。

Regarding pricing, the Devialet Phantom Ultimate 98dB version starts at 13,980 yuan, with the special edition at 16,980 yuan; the 108dB version is priced from 28,580 yuan, and the Opéra de Paris Special Edition is 33,580 yuan. The new products will be available for purchase starting September 17th at Devialet offline stores, WeChat mini-programs, Tmall, JD.com, and authorized retailer channels. 售价方面，Devialet Phantom Ultimate 98dB 版本售价 13980 元起，特别版为 16980 元；108dB 版本定价 28580 元起，巴黎歌剧院特别版为 33580 元。新品自 9 月 17 日起在 Devialet 线下门店、微信小程序、天猫、京东及授权零售商渠道开售。

item.title: 4199 元起，iQOO 15 正式发布
item.guid: 4199-元起，iQOO-15-正式发布
item.description:
Last night, iQOO officially released its new generation flagship phone, the iQOO 15. The new device is equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate processor and features a Samsung 2K Everest screen. 昨日晚间，iQOO 正式发布新一代旗舰手机 iQOO 15，新机搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版处理器，并配备三星 2K 珠峰屏。

In terms of appearance, the new machine offers 4 color options including Lingyun, Legend Edition, Track Edition, and Wilderness. It features an AG micro-frosted back cover and AF coating process, continuing the large R-angle design style, and adds an energy halo light strip below the Deco area. 外观方面，新机提供凌云、传奇版、赛道版、旷野等 4 款配色，采用 AG 微磨砂后盖与 AF 镀膜工艺，机身设计延续大 R 角风格，并在 Deco 区域下方加入能量光环灯带。

Key configurations include: 核心配置包括：

    Screen: 2K Samsung Everest screen (M14 luminous material), 6000nits peak brightness;

    Storage: LPDDR 5X Ultra + UFS 4.1, with a maximum speed of 9600Mbps, and the top-tier version is equipped with LPDDR 5X Ultra Pro flash memory with a speed of up to 10667 Mbps;

    Cooling: Single-layer VC cooling plate, covering an area of over 14000mm²;

    Battery: 7000mAh single-cell Blue Ocean battery, supporting 100W wired fast charging and 40W wireless fast charging;

    Imaging: 50-megapixel Sony large-sensor main camera + 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle + 50-megapixel periscope telephoto + 32-megapixel front camera;

    System: Debuts with OriginOS 6, emphasizing "five years of heavy full-scenario use with lasting smoothness."

In terms of gaming experience, the iQOO 15 is equipped with the self-developed esports chip Q3, supporting full-scene ray tracing, game super resolution, and super frame, and has established in-depth cooperation with multiple mainstream mobile games. The new machine also features a 3200Hz instantaneous touch sampling rate and a War Hammer MAX dual-axis vibration motor, further enhancing operational feedback. 在游戏体验方面，iQOO 15 搭载自研电竞芯片 Q3，支持全场景光追、游戏超分与超帧，并与多款主流手游展开深度合作。新机还配备 3200Hz 瞬时触控采样率和战锤 MAX 双轴振感马达，进一步提升操作反馈。

In terms of pricing, the iQOO 15 starts at 4199 yuan (12GB + 256GB), with a maximum option of 16GB + 1TB storage combination. 售价方面，iQOO 15 4199 元起售（12GB + 256GB），最高可选 16GB + 1TB 存储组合。

item.title: 单卡日处理 20 万页文档，DeepSeek-OCR 开源上线
item.guid: 单卡日处理-20-万页文档，DeepSeek-OCR-开源上线
item.description:
According to reports from "AI Cambrian", the DeepSeek team recently released a new research achievement, DeepSeek-OCR, proposing the "contextual optical compression" method, which brings a breakthrough idea for long text processing in large models. 据「Al寒武纪」报道，DeepSeek 团队近日发布全新研究成果 DeepSeek-OCR，提出「上下文光学压缩」方法，为大模型长文本处理带来突破性思路。

Research shows that by rendering long texts as images and then converting them into visual tokens, computational costs can be significantly reduced while maintaining high accuracy. 研究显示，通过将长文本渲染为图像，再转化为视觉 token，能够在保持高精度的同时显著降低计算成本。

Experimental data shows that at a compression ratio of less than 10x, the OCR decoding accuracy is as high as 97%; even at an ultra-high compression ratio of 20x, the accuracy can still be maintained at approximately 60%. On the authoritative document parsing benchmark OmniDocBench, this model surpassed several mainstream SOTA models with fewer visual tokens. 实验数据显示，在小于 10 倍压缩率下，OCR 解码准确率高达 97%；即便在 20 倍超高压缩率下，准确率仍能维持在约 60%。在权威文档解析基准 OmniDocBench 上，该模型以更少的视觉 token 超越了多项主流 SOTA 模型。

In practical applications, a single A100-40G GPU can process over 200,000 pages of documents per day, providing massive data support for large model training. 在实际应用中，单台 A100-40G GPU 每天可处理超过 20 万页文档，为大模型训练提供海量数据支持。

Currently, the relevant code and model weights have been open-sourced on GitHub and Hugging Face platforms. 目前，相关代码与模型权重已在 GitHub 与 Hugging Face 平台开源。

item.title: 599 美元，科勒推出 Dekoda 如厕健康监测器
item.guid: 599-美元，科勒推出-Dekoda-如厕健康监测器
item.description:
Recently, the renowned bathroom brand Kohler released a new device named Dekoda. 近日，知名卫浴品牌科勒 (Kohler) 发布了一款名为 Dekoda 的新设备。

Unlike traditional bathroom products, Dekoda is officially positioned as a "toilet health monitor" and can be installed inside the toilet bowl. It analyzes excrement through sensors, thereby providing multi-dimensional data including hydration intake, gut health, and potential blood traces . 不同于传统卫浴产品，Dekoda 被官方定位为「如厕健康监测器」，可安装在马桶内圈， 通过传感器对排泄物进行分析，从而提供包括水分摄入、肠道健康以及潜在血液迹象在内的多维度数据 。

Kohler stated that Dekoda's research and development spanned over 10 years, accumulating 1.2 million data points, and involved up to 8 Ph.D.-level experts in its study to ensure scientific effectiveness. 科勒方面表示，Dekoda 的研发历时超过 10 年，累计采集 120 万条数据点，并由多达 8 位博士级专家参与研究，以确保科学有效性。

Users do not need to perform any additional operations during their daily toilet routine; the device passively collects data and generates personalized health reports through the Kohler Health app. 用户在日常如厕过程中无需额外操作，设备即可被动采集数据，并通过 Kohler Health 应用生成个性化健康报告。

However, Dekoda's pricing has also drawn attention. The device is priced at $599 (approximately 4266 RMB), and its accompanying application requires an additional subscription to unlock full features. 不过，Dekoda 的定价也引发关注。该设备售价为 599 美元（约 4266 元人民币），且配套应用需额外订阅才能解锁完整功能。

Currently, Dekoda is available for sale in the North American market and is expected to expand to more regions in the future. 目前，Dekoda 已在北美市场开售，未来有望扩展至更多地区。

item.title: 霸王茶姬亮相第 12 届乌镇戏剧节
item.guid: 霸王茶姬亮相第-12-届乌镇戏剧节
item.description:
Recently, CHAGEE once again partnered with the Wuzhen Theatre Festival, jointly launching a cross-border journey themed "Soaring." This year, the brand appeared as the "Oriental Tea Culture Partner" at the 12th Wuzhen Theatre Festival, bringing a series of immersive experiences that blend tea beverages with drama. 近日，霸王茶姬再度携手乌镇戏剧节，共同开启主题为「扶摇」的跨界之旅。今年，品牌以「东方茶文化合作伙伴」身份亮相第 12 届乌镇戏剧节，带来一系列融合茶饮与戏剧的沉浸式体验。

It is understood that CHAGEE has created a "CHAGEE Theatre Teahouse," art installations, a carnival parade toast event, and a themed play "Meeting Friends with Tea, Soaring Together" in Wuzhen. 据了解，霸王茶姬在乌镇打造了「CHAGEE 戏剧茶铺」、艺术装置、嘉年华巡游碰杯活动，以及「以茶会友·扶摇同行」主题剧目。

At the same time, CHAGEE also launched three co-branded merchandise items, exclusive theatrical dialogue tickets, and limited theatrical personality cards, allowing audiences to continue the "theatrical feeling" in their daily lives. 同时，霸王茶姬还推出三款联动周边、专属戏剧台词小票和限定戏剧人格卡片，让观众在日常生活中也能延续「剧场感」。

The official statement indicates that the combination of tea and drama is not only a dual feast for taste and vision but also an expansion of cultural boundaries. Through the concept of "Meeting World Friends with Oriental Tea," CHAGEE hopes to make a cup of tea a cultural vessel for communicating with the world. 官方表示，茶与戏的结合不仅是味觉与视觉的双重盛宴，更是一次文化边界的拓展。通过「以东方茶，会世界友」的理念，霸王茶姬希望让一杯茶成为沟通世界的文化容器。

It is worth mentioning that last year, CHAGEE, as the exclusive tea beverage partner of the Wuzhen Theatre Festival, created experiential spaces such as "Theatre Teahouse," "Theatre Pop-up," and "Theatre Pop-up Courtyard." This year's collaboration further deepens on this foundation, extending the cross-border path of tea beverages and drama to more scenarios. 值得一提的是，去年霸王茶姬作为乌镇戏剧节独家茶饮合作伙伴，曾打造「戏剧茶铺」「戏剧慢闪」「剧场慢闪院子」等体验空间。今年的合作则在此基础上进一步深化，将茶饮与戏剧的跨界路径延展至更多场景。

item.title: 无印良品在日本关闭网店，官方称无法确认恢复时间
item.guid: 无印良品在日本关闭网店，官方称无法确认恢复时间
item.description:
According to Nikkei Asia, Ryohin Keikaku, the parent company of Muji, recently announced that its official online store in Japan has been closed since the evening of October 19, due to a ransomware attack on its logistics partner ASKUL, which caused a complete system shutdown. 据《日本经济新闻》报道，日前，无印良品母公司良品计划宣布，由于物流合作伙伴アスクル（ASKUL）遭遇勒索软件攻击并导致系统全面瘫痪，公司在日本的官方线上网店自 10 月 19 日晚间起关闭。

This incident not only affected Muji's official website but also impacted multiple functions of its official application, including product browsing, order inquiries, newsletter reading, and monthly subscription applications, all of which became unusable. 此次事件不仅影响了无印良品的官方网站，还波及其官方应用程序的多项功能，包括商品浏览、订单查询、新闻通讯阅读、包月服务申请等，均出现无法正常使用的情况。

Ryohin Keikaku stated that it is working closely with ASKUL to investigate the scope of the incident and advance restoration efforts, but currently cannot confirm a specific recovery timeline. The "MUJI Week" promotional event, originally scheduled from October 24 to November 3, will now only take place at physical stores. 良品计划方面表示，正在与 ASKUL 紧密合作，调查事件影响范围并推进修复工作，但目前尚无法确认具体恢复时间表。原定于 10 月 24 日至 11 月 3 日举行的「MUJI Week」优惠活动将仅在线下门店进行。

item.title: LABUBU 十周年全球展首站落地上海，六大主题空间全面开放
item.guid: LABUBU-十周年全球展首站落地上海，六大主题空间全面开放
item.description:
According to SocialBeta, THE MONSTERS' tenth-anniversary global exhibition recently officially opened its first stop in Shanghai. 据 SocialBeta 报道，近日，THE MONSTERS 十周年全球展览首站在上海正式开幕。

The exhibition, themed "MONSTERS BY MONSTERS: Present and Future," comprehensively reviews the ten-year journey of characters like LABUBU from artistic creation to cultural symbols. 展览以「MONSTERS BY MONSTERS 此刻与未来」为主题，全面回顾 LABUBU 等角色从艺术创作走向文化符号的十年历程。

The exhibition entrance features a "Gate of Illusion," where visitors can sequentially explore six themed spaces, including "Fantasy Forest," "Elf Carnival Party," "Art Corridor," "Manuscript Research Lab," "Light and Shadow Playground," and "Mirror House." 展览入口设置「幻境之门」，观众可依次探索六大主题空间，包括「奇幻森林」「精灵狂欢派对」「艺术回廊」「手稿研究室」「光影游乐场」以及「镜屋」。

Among them, the "Elf Carnival Party" area, composed of approximately 2000 LABUBU plush toys, became the most popular photo spot at the venue. 其中，「精灵狂欢派对」区域由约 2000 只 LABUBU 毛绒玩偶组成，成为现场最受欢迎的打卡点。

Artist Kasing Lung also completed a graffiti creation on a wall at the venue before the opening. The exhibition area simultaneously displays over a hundred precious original manuscripts, fully presenting the entire process of the IP from inspiration to formation. The "Mirror House" showcases classic figurines from over the years, like flipping through THE MONSTERS' growth album. 艺术家龙家升也在开幕前于现场墙面完成涂鸦创作，展区同时展出百余幅珍贵原稿，完整呈现 IP 从灵感到成型的全过程。「镜屋」则陈列历年来的经典公仔，宛如翻阅 THE MONSTERS 的成长相册。

Additionally, the large KING MON sculpture and graffiti wall in the outdoor area attracted many passersby to stop and take photos. The two major landmark screens in Lujiazui and Nanjing East Road also simultaneously displayed LABUBU images, adding momentum to the tenth-anniversary celebration. Officials stated that this exhibition will last for one year and will successively land in multiple cities worldwide. 此外，户外区域的 KING MON 大型雕塑与涂鸦墙吸引大量路人驻足拍照。陆家嘴与南京东路两大地标屏幕也同步亮相 LABUBU 影像，为十周年庆典增添声势。官方表示，这场展览将持续一年，并陆续登陆全球多座城市。

item.title: 《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》定档 10 月 31 日
item.guid: 《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》定档-10-月-31-日
item.description:
Recently, the Japanese anime epic "Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Final Impact" officially announced its release in mainland cinemas on October 31. This final chapter of the new theatrical film series, led by Hideaki Anno, is regarded as the ultimate conclusion to the EVA series. 近日，日本动画史诗《天鹰战士：最后的冲击》正式宣布将于 10 月 31 日登陆内地院线。这部新剧场版系列的终章由庵野秀明领衔制作，被视为 EVA 系列的最终落幕之作。

The film continues the series' consistent grand worldview and philosophical contemplation, focusing on Shinji Ikari's spiritual struggle and journey of salvation after the "Third Impact." 影片延续了系列一贯的宏大世界观与哲学思辨，聚焦碇真嗣在「第三次冲击」后的心灵挣扎与救赎之旅。

Since its TV debut in 1995, 'Neon Genesis Evangelion' has become a classic icon in global animation history. 自 1995 年 TV 版问世以来，《新世纪福音战士》已成为全球动画史上的经典符号。

item.title: 《三滴血》新预告曝光
item.guid: 《三滴血》新预告曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, the film 'Three Drops of Blood' released its 'Who Will Win' trailer and 'Entering the Game' poster, with the film set for nationwide release on November 15. 昨天，电影《三滴血》发布「鹿死谁手」版预告及「执棋入局」海报，影片将于 11 月 15 日全国公映。

The trailer uses stark imagery to reveal the cruel truth behind the human trafficking industry. Hu Ge as 'Reindeer', Wen Qi as the pregnant woman Li Qi, and Gao Ziqi as the mute teenager Binggun, are all forced into a wicked transaction amidst a snowy landscape. 预告片以冷峻影像揭开人口贩卖产业链的残酷内幕。胡歌饰演的「驯鹿」、文淇饰演的孕妇李棋，以及高子淇饰演的哑巴少年冰棍，三人被迫卷入一场冰天雪地中的罪恶交易。

The 'Entering the Game' poster, released simultaneously, uses a train carriage as its setting, where the three characters, though close, harbor their own thoughts, subtly hinting at the chasm in human nature. 同步发布的「执棋入局」海报以火车车厢为场景，三位角色虽近在咫尺，却各怀心思，暗喻人性鸿沟。

The film runs for 110 minutes and is categorized as drama/crime. The creative team stated their hope to expose the dark truth of the human trafficking industry through authentic and raw performances, presenting a confrontation that challenges the limits of human morality. 影片时长 110 分钟，类型为剧情 / 犯罪。主创团队表示，希望通过真实而粗粝的表演，直击人贩产业链的黑暗真相，呈现一场关乎人性底线的较量。

item.title: 《铁血战士：杀戮之地》定档 11 月 7 日，同步北美上映
item.guid: 《铁血战士：杀戮之地》定档-11-月-7-日，同步北美上映
item.description:
The sci-fi action blockbuster 'Predator: Badlands' has officially announced its simultaneous release in mainland China and North America on November 7. The film is produced by 20th Century Studios, imported by China Film Group Corporation, and co-distributed by Huaxia Film Distribution Co., Ltd. 科幻动作大片《铁血战士：杀戮之地》（Predator: Badlands）正式宣布将于 11 月 7 日在中国内地同步北美上映。影片由 20 世纪影业出品，中国电影集团公司引进，并联合华夏电影发行有限责任公司发行。

The film is produced by the team behind 'Alien: Covenant', continuing the style of hardcore sci-fi and thriller elements. 本片由曾打造《异形：夺命舰》的团队操刀制作，延续了硬核科幻与惊悚元素的风格。

The story follows a young Predator, exiled by its tribe, who unexpectedly allies with the bionic human Thia, engaging in a life-or-death struggle across a deadly alien wasteland. 故事讲述一名被部落放逐的年轻铁血战士，意外与仿生人希雅（Thia）结盟，在充满致命威胁的异星荒原中展开生死搏杀。

Reportedly, 'Predator: Badlands' has a runtime of 121 minutes and will be released in theaters in various formats including 2D, 3D, CINITY, IMAX, Dolby Cinema, and China Giant Screen. 据悉，《铁血战士：杀戮之地》片长 121 分钟，将以 2D、3D、CINITY、IMAX、杜比影院及中国巨幕等多种制式登陆院线。

Starring Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi, the two will face an unprecedented ultimate trial together in the 'Hell Hunt'. 主演包括艾丽·范宁（Elle Fanning）与迪米特里乌斯·舒斯特-科洛阿玛坦吉（Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi），两人将在「地狱猎场」中共同面对前所未有的终极试炼。
